channel.title: Projects on Pietro Lesci
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Pietro Lesci

item.title: MACE
item.description: When evaluating redundant annotations (like those from Amazon’s MechanicalTurk), we usually want to (i) aggregate annotations to recover the most likely answer, (ii) find out which annotators are trustworthy, (iii) evaluate item and task difficulty. MACE solves all of these problems, by learning competence estimates for each annotators and computing the most likely answer based on those competences.

item.title: Wordify
item.description: Wordify is an online textual processing tool that allows to find out which terms are most indicative for each dependent variable values.

item.title: Statistical Concepts with R
item.description: Book written with bookdown about elementary statistical concepts.
